events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at TechNova.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on your technical skills.
You responded promptly and confirmed your availability for the next stage of interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM to evaluate your software development expertise.
The technical interview was completed and the interviewers gave highly positive feedback regarding your coding abilities and problem-solving approach.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM to discuss your cultural fit and employment terms.
You completed the HR interview with successful discussion on benefits, workplace environment, and expectations.
An offer has been formally proposed to you, including details of compensation, benefits, and start date.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your interest in joining our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you to the engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and access to development tools and resources.
The hiring process is now complete, and you have successfully joined the team as a Software Engineer at TechNova.
